text: Mindchamps @ Tagore has been one of the best decisions I made for my son. While scouting around for a preschool that could accommodate my son's food allergies, MC@Tagore was the best choice and both principal and teachers were so warm, welcoming and formed a high-spirited team. The academic excellence that the school upholds and experiences that the school provides the children with is nothing short of exceptional. Rigour is infused seamlessly into the curriculum! Highly recommend this outlet of Mindchamps where everyone feels like family!

The school does a good job in providing fun and conducive environment for the champs.  They make learning fun and this helps the champs resonates with concepts and understanding.

Asides from the curriculum, they brings the champs out for regular outings and contribute to good social cause forging even better friendships while coming together to understand different social circumstances within our society.

Ms Laura, the principal, and her cohesive and stable team of like-minded teachers, have created a positive and loving environment at this centre. Beyond the Mindchamps brand, curriculum and infrastructure, it is the people that have made the difference. We have been here for 5 years, and it is clear that our kids have had a truly wonderful preschool experience. Our greatest thanks to all the teachers who taught them.

MindChamps has the sweetest, most caring and fun teachers, especially Ms Jasmine, Deng laoshi and Ms Farah. They’ve made school such an enjoyable and magical experience for our son. I wish I had such teachers growing up!

My family and I really enjoyed the Family Sports Day organised by the teachers! Although it was only from 9am - 11.30am but there were many activities that both parents and kids could participate in!

Can tell that the school and teachers really put a lot of thought and effort in planning this event for the parents and kids!

Thank you!! ☺️
